name: FMR Controller
Version 1.0 [README]
info:
This flow requiers that you have installed "Recorder" on a server.
https://github.com/pandosme/recorder

If you have not already imported "Common Flows", do so.
Uf you want to record on SD Card, import the "Convert SD Recording to MP4" flow.

name: Message
Default settings
Validate
Presense
AOA Detection
Motion Detection
List Last Hour
Video player
Common Flows [Import]
info:
NOTE: This flow requires the "Common Flows".
Import the following flow into your Node-RED and set the cameras and MQTT Settings.

        "id": "5c11fed7a3291d98",

        "info": "",

name: Convert SD Recording to MP4 [Import]
info:
Import this flow into your Node-RED if you intend to use SD Recording.
You also need to import the node node-red-contrib-fs

[
    {
        "id": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "type": "tab",

        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "44f3aebb73b9e7b5",
        "name": "Create mp4 directory on SD Card",
        "props": [
            {

            },

                "p": "topic",
                "vt": "str"
            }
        ],
        "repeat": "",
        "crontab": "",

        ]

    {
        "id": "a6e48175e923dc23",

        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "44f3aebb73b9e7b5",
        "command": "mkdir sdcard/mp4",
        "addpay": "",
        "append": "",
        "useSpawn": "false",
        "timer": "",
        "winHide": false,
        "oldrc": false,
        "name": "",
        "x": 730,
        "y": 120,
        "wires": [
            [],
            [],
            []
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "b261fc1992a35ca0",
        "type": "debug",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "name": "debug 34",
        "active": false,
        "tosidebar": true,

        "complete": "false",

        "x": 910,

        "wires": []
    },
    {
        "id": "041f9f397d99e807",
        "type": "debug",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "name": "debug 36",
        "active": false,
        "tosidebar": true,
        "console": false,
        "tostatus": false,
        "complete": "false",
        "statusVal": "",
        "statusType": "auto",
        "x": 1180,
        "y": 580,
        "wires": []
    },
    {
        "id": "dd671bc5d7b9c5fb",
        "type": "debug",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "name": "debug 45",
        "active": false,
        "tosidebar": true,
        "console": false,
        "tostatus": false,
        "complete": "payload",
        "targetType": "msg",
        "statusVal": "",
        "statusType": "auto",
        "x": 1180,
        "y": 640,
        "wires": []
    },
    {
        "id": "be6606a4b3fb30e3",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "GStreamer",
        "func": "msg.payload = 'gst-launch-1.0 filesrc location=' + msg.payload.fullpath + ' ! matroskademux ! h264parse ! mp4mux ! filesink location=sdcard/mp4/' + msg.payload.name + '.mp4';\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "timeout": 0,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "libs": [],
        "x": 410,
        "y": 700,
        "wires": [
            [
                "09940289127eaa87"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "e755cacb3d2a5c56",
        "type": "Events",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "group": "storage",
        "initialization": false,
        "x": 320,
        "y": 540,
        "wires": [
            [
                "e48ee23dd474b296"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "e48ee23dd474b296",
        "type": "switch",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "Recording Event?",
        "property": "topic",
        "propertyType": "msg",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "eq",
                "v": "storage/recording",
                "vt": "str"
            }
        ],
        "checkall": "true",
        "repair": false,
        "outputs": 1,
        "x": 430,
        "y": 580,
        "wires": [
            [
                "fdaf7029c528784c"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "fdaf7029c528784c",
        "type": "switch",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "Recording stopped?",
        "property": "payload.recording",
        "propertyType": "msg",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "eq",
                "v": "0",
                "vt": "num"
            }
        ],
        "checkall": "true",
        "repair": false,
        "outputs": 1,
        "x": 660,
        "y": 580,
        "wires": [
            [
                "60d02c5063dfe497"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "09940289127eaa87",
        "type": "exec",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "command": "",
        "addpay": "payload",
        "append": "",
        "useSpawn": "true",
        "timer": "",
        "winHide": false,
        "oldrc": false,
        "name": "",
        "x": 610,
        "y": 700,
        "wires": [
            [],
            [
                "49e4d6ce311aac58"
            ],
            [
                "3036c781ed8d934c"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "3036c781ed8d934c",
        "type": "switch",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "OK",
        "property": "payload.code",
        "propertyType": "msg",
        "rules": [
            {
                "t": "eq",
                "v": "0",
                "vt": "num"
            }
        ],
        "checkall": "true",
        "repair": false,
        "outputs": 1,
        "x": 390,
        "y": 760,
        "wires": [
            [
                "91ad1e99f666dba8"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "91ad1e99f666dba8",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "Complete",
        "func": "msg.topic = \"storage/recording/mp4/\" + flow.get(\"camera\").serial\nvar recording = flow.get(\"recording\");\nvar camera = flow.get(\"camera\");\nrecording.mp4 = recording.name + \".mp4\";\nflow.set(\"recording\",recording);\nmsg.payload = {\n    name: camera.hostname || camera.serial,\n    serial: camera.serial,\n    address: camera.IPv4,\n    model: camera.model,\n    id: recording.name,\n    source: \"SD\",\n    url: \"http://\" + camera.IPv4 + ':1880/mp4?file=' + recording.mp4,\n    mkv: \"http://\" + camera.IPv4 + '/axis-cgi/record/export/properties.cgi?schemaversion=1?diskid=SD_DISK&recordingid=' + recording.name,\n    start: recording.start,\n    end: recording.end,\n    duration: recording.duration,\n    resolution: recording.width + \"x\" + recording.height,\n    fps: recording.fps\n}\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "timeout": 0,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "libs": [],
        "x": 620,
        "y": 760,
        "wires": [
            [
                "78f2449fd707ee28"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "63730cdb4e0cada5",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "Get Video Data",
        "func": "var recording = flow.get(\"recording\");\nvar items = recording.fullpath.split('/');\nmsg.filename = items[0] + '/' + items[1] + '/' + items[2] + '/' + items[3] + '/recording.xml';\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "timeout": 0,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "libs": [],
        "x": 420,
        "y": 640,
        "wires": [
            [
                "df21ecc12edc8446"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "60d02c5063dfe497",
        "type": "trigger",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "",
        "op1": "",
        "op2": "",
        "op1type": "nul",
        "op2type": "payl",
        "duration": "500",
        "extend": true,
        "overrideDelay": false,
        "units": "ms",
        "reset": "",
        "bytopic": "all",
        "topic": "topic",
        "outputs": 1,
        "x": 880,
        "y": 580,
        "wires": [
            [
                "63730cdb4e0cada5",
                "041f9f397d99e807"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "df21ecc12edc8446",
        "type": "file in",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "",
        "filename": "filename",
        "filenameType": "msg",
        "format": "utf8",
        "chunk": false,
        "sendError": false,
        "encoding": "none",
        "allProps": false,
        "x": 620,
        "y": 640,
        "wires": [
            [
                "29cdab8f595754ab"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "29cdab8f595754ab",
        "type": "xml",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "",
        "property": "payload",
        "attr": "",
        "chr": "",
        "x": 770,
        "y": 640,
        "wires": [
            [
                "e282c072b9040bf4"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "e282c072b9040bf4",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "1a32648ea2d13f43",
        "g": "89d84fe29e9feb23",
        "name": "Data",
        "func": "var recording = flow.get(\"recording\");\nrecording.token = msg.payload.Recording.$.RecordingToken;\nrecording.start = new Date(msg.payload.Recording.StartTime[0]).getTime();\nrecording.end = new Date(msg.payload.Recording.StopTime[0]).getTime();\nrecording.duration = (recording.end - recording.start) / 1000;\nrecording.width = parseInt(msg.payload.Recording.Track[0].VideoAttributes[0].Width[0]);\nrecording.height = parseInt(msg.payload.Recording.Track[0].VideoAttributes[0].Height[0]);\nrecording.fps = parseInt(msg.payload.Recording.Track[0].VideoAttributes[0].Framerate[0]);\nrecording.tag = msg.payload.Recording.CustomAttributes[0].TriggerName[0];\nrecording.mp4 = null;\nflow.set(\"recording\",recording);\nmsg.payload = recording;\nreturn msg;",
        "outputs": 1,
        "timeout": 0,
        "noerr": 0,
        "initialize": "",
        "finalize": "",
        "libs": [],
        "x": 910,
        "y": 640,
        "wires": [
            [
                "be6606a4b3fb30e3",
                "dd671bc5d7b9c5fb"
            ]
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "99fa105f2ab681d2",

        "func": "msg.recording = {\n    fullpath: msg.payload\n}\nvar pathItems = msg.recording.fullpath.split(\"/\");\nmsg.recording.file = pathItems[pathItems.length-1];\nmsg.recording.name = msg.recording.file.split(\".\")[0];\nmsg.recording.ext = msg.recording.file.split(\".\")[1];\n\nmsg.payload = msg.recording;\n return msg;",
